body:
Hey guys it's been a while since I uploaded and I'm sorry for that; the reason being is that I have had exams the past month and I have 4 exams to go + I'm going to be moving out really soon so this will be my last video before I move out and then I'll probably upload in around 2-3 weeks. Don't worry though once I'm all set up I'll be uploading again :) Thanks for watching I hope you enjoyed the video and tell me what you think of the new effects I tried out; I don't really know how to do flickers so if anyone has a clue (I use Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2014) that'd be great :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p5tsiDrjmfA

i swear the music reminds me of tynvale xD
